Rules and recommendations

It is only possible to offer rehabilitation and spa care that is at least partially funded from the public health insurance.

Self-payers, who do not fulfill the conditions to be covered by the public health insurance, can't receive spa treatment. This also applies to wellness.

If receiving spa treatment, follow the hygienic measures and wear a mask in common areas. If you have any signs of a respiratory illness (a cough or breathing problems) or a temperature before your stay, consult your doctor whether to get tested or postpone your stay. If you meet someone positive, get tested before you arrive at the spa.

Medical care and other illnesses cannot be neglected as a result of Covid-19. If prescribed by a doctor, and you are without any signs of the coronavirus, you can visit a spa. The more considerate you are towards employees and other guests, such as following all hygienic measures, the more pleasant and safe your stay will be.

questions_answers.question: I have been tested positive for Covid-19; can I visit spa?
Can I visit a spa for a purpose of wellness stay?
Can I visit a spa based on a prescription from my GP, after surgery, etc.?
questions_answers.value: Yes, if your stay is at least partly covered by your health insurance.

questions_answers.question: Why cannot private payers stay at the spa?
questions_answers.value: With respect to the number of infected, our effort is to minimize non-essential contacts even in spa areas. Capacity of the spa can be possibly used for treating Covid+ patients.

questions_answers.question: Can I be visited in a spa?
Can the public enter the spa?
Can I enter the spa swimming pool if I'm not staying at the spa?
Is a negative Covid test result necessary when entering the spa?
questions_answers.value: No, but you can be asked to undergo measuring of body temperature.

questions_answers.question: Am I obliged to wear face mask in common areas?
What is the name of the program offering discounts for spa visits?
questions_answers.value: Vouchers are provided as part of the compensation program “COVID-Lázně”. The vouchers are only applicable in certain spas, please check the availability before booking your stay.
